channel.title: Scape Private Server v.2.0 - Dylan's Revenge [Developement Team]!
channel.description:
[center][b]*If you're already staff of the Server, please be more active on www.scapeboards.co.nr. *If you're not staff of the Server and would like to check out the site go to www.scapeboards.co.nr.[/b]
Welcome to the official board of the Scape Private Server v.2.0 - Dylan's Revenge, here I will ask you all for your hand in coding this one. This server is basically based off of a PKing Server called Scape, that I myself made, right now the hometown is Edgeville, but lately my users are requesting farther things and wish to have more made in the server, so well now I have decided to make a Version 2 of the Scape Private Server!
If you'd like to see our official site so far please go to www.scapeboards.co.nr, this site offers all the new updates, events and competitions coming up on the Scape Private Server.
[u][b][size=17pt]To Do's:[/size][/b][/u] -Make a new starting area/arena. -Make training spots. -Make beginning training spots (People can train Att, Str, Def, Rng, Mage to 40 first then they must train on npcs which they get 10xp per there attacking mode times there hits. Each player will get about 250 exp per monster. -Make tougher opponents, such as the Tok brothers and Dag Monsters. -Make portals in a room with no mismatching colours. -Make an efficient way of woodcutting, getting items with level 1-15, 16-30 you get items and so on with the real woodcutting levels. -Do the same as the woodcutting proposal with Fishing, Firemaking and Farming. -For Fletching add a Crystal-bow making feature. -Make the 4212 Crystal Bow ID work when using Range on opponents and npcs. -Making Large PKing Arenas. -Change starting equipment, invetory and skills. This is the small list for now, I will be adding more once these requirements are met.
If you would like to join the staff team of the SPS v.2.0 please use this form:
* - Must have.
[code]* Your name: Your email: * Your msn: * Your position: * Your desired ingame name: * Your gender - M/F:[/code]
Positions needed for filling:
- Scape Moderator - Scape Coder - Scape Administrator (Must have coding abilities and moderation abilities) - ScapeBoards Global Moderator[/center]
[center][u][b]Coders:[/b][/u] [img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/7750/modgoldbi2.gif[/img] [b]GoldenShard[/b] [img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/7750/modgoldbi2.gif[/img] [img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/7750/modgoldbi2.gif[/img] [img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/7750/modgoldbi2.gif[/img] [img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/7750/modgoldbi2.gif[/img] [img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/7750/modgoldbi2.gif[/img] [img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/7750/modgoldbi2.gif[/img]
[u][b]Moderators:[/b][/u] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img]
[u][b]ScapeBoards Global Moderators:[/u] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img] [img]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/9845/modsilverel3.gif[/img]
Please get in your applications in quickly, this thread will be closed soon.
GoldenShard[/center]

[center]*If youâ€™re already staff of the Server, please be more active on www.scapeboards.co.nr.

Welcome to the official board of the Scape Private Server v.2.0 - Dylanâ€™s Revenge, here I will ask you all for your hand in coding this one. This server is basically based off of a PKing Server called Scape, that I myself made, right now the hometown is Edgeville, but lately my users are requesting farther things and wish to have more made in the server, so well now I have decided to make a Version 2 of the Scape Private Server!

If youâ€™d like to see our official site so far please go to www.scapeboards.co.nr, this site offers all the new updates, events and competitions coming up on the Scape Private Server.

[size=17pt]To Doâ€™s:[/size]
-Make a new starting area/arena.
-Make training spots.
-Make beginning training spots (People can train Att, Str, Def, Rng, Mage to 40 first then they must train on npcs which they get 10xp per there attacking mode times there hits. Each player will get about 250 exp per monster.
